BusProcessFeedbackConfig.name: BusProcessFeedbackConfig
BusProcessFeedbackConfig.description: Represents information about the configuration for feedback collection. The feedback collection method triggers against pre-determined conditions on object to gather feedback.

ActionName.description: Name of the method used to gather feedback.

Field.description: Represents the picklist field whose value triggers the feedback collection.

FieldValue.description: Represents the field value that triggers the feedback collection.

IsActive.description: Indicates if the feedback configuration is active (true) or not (false).

ManageableState.description: Indicates the manageable state of the specified component that is contained in a package.

MasterLabel.description: Name of the resource, limited up to 100 characters.

NamespacePrefix.description: Namespace prefix associated with this object. Each Developer Edition org that creates a managed package has a unique namespace prefix.

Object.description: Represents the entity on which the feedback collection triggering condition depends.

Recipient.description: Represents the recipient who is contacted for the feedback collection.

RecordType.description: Represents the record type of the entity on which the feedback collection triggering condition depends.

TriggerAction.description: Action available with the business process feedback object.
